# Accessible filesystems, by reference, are maintained under '/dev/disk'
# See man pages fstab(5), findfs(8), mount(8) and/or blkid(8) for more info
#
/dev/mapper/vg_numepproc8-lv_root	/	ext4	defaults	1	1
UUID=e816e59c-63eb-4a39-b5a1-a830f4780cb5	/boot	ext4	defaults	1	2
/dev/mapper/vg_numepproc8-lv_home	/home	ext4	defaults	1	2
/dev/mapper/vg_numepproc8-lv_swap	swap	swap	defaults	0	0
tmpfs	/dev/shm	tmpfs	defaults	0	0
devpts	/dev/pts	devpts	gid=5,mode=620	0	0
sysfs	/sys	sysfs	defaults	0	0
proc	/proc	proc	defaults	0	0
ccon:/mnt/condisk	/mnt/condisk	nfs	defaults	0	0
xrootdfs                /mnt/xrootd             fuse    rdr=xroot://osg-se.research.northwestern.edu:1094//storage/grid/,uid=xrootd 0 0
